# Literature
Distribution
central Washington south through Oregon, southwest Idaho, throughout southwest and into Mexico, east into Texas and Oklahoma
General Habitat
arid low elevation regions, most commonly associated with rocky areas

no information available

rocky areas, areas with rodent burrows

mostly small  lizards, lizard eggs, small frogs or toads, large insects
